MAIN_MESSAGE: There is power cut in the EH54 postcode area of Livingston. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:10pm. Our control centre will attempt to reset the network remotely to restore power in stages, and our emergency response team have now arrived at the Deans primary substation. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5:15pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:42pm on Thursday, 18 March 2021
